name: Team Ninja tools
short_description:
Mirroring all the open source tools made by b0ny, chrrox, mariokart64n, zaykho and tcl36478655.
All credit goes to them.

Some of the files were hosted in temporary file hosting services so
I'm reuploading them here so they'll never get lost.

Contain no copyrighted material from Tecmo, Team Ninja or other company.

DOA Paradise tools: http://git.daifukkat.su/?p=spark.git;a=summary

Most are addons for Blender 3d modeller, some are standalone tools
and some are QuickBMS scripts.
summary: Tools for files from Team Ninja games
